select bi.id, sm.material_nb, sm.sscc_number, mm.name as material_name, sm.batch_nb, str_to_date(smr.expire_date,'%d/%m/%Y') as expire_date, sm.ware_code, bi.recommend_bin_code, bi.actual_bin_code, bi.quantity, bi.pallet_code, mm.pallet_type, bi.status, bi.create_by,bi.create_time,sm.plant_nb,bi.move_type,bi.update_by,bi.update_time,smr.update_user as receive_by from si_material_in sm left join bi_in bi on bi.sscc_number=sm.sscc_number and sm.delete_flag = 0 and bi.delete_flag = 0 left join si_material_receive smr on smr.sscc_number = sm.sscc_number and smr.delete_flag = 0 left join md_material mm on sm.material_nb = mm.code and mm.delete_flag = 0 where sm.delete_flag = 0 and sm.sscc_number not in (select sscc_number from bi_in where bi.delete_flag =1) and sm.material_nb like concat('%', #{materialNb}, '%') and sm.sscc_number like concat('%', #{ssccNumber}, '%') and bi.move_type like concat('%', #{moveType}, '%') and mm.name like concat('%', #{materialName}, '%') and bi.pallet_code like concat('%', #{palletCode}, '%')
and sm.batch_nb like concat('%', #{batchNb}, '%') and sm.plant_nb like concat('%', #{plantNb}, '%') and sm.ware_code like concat('%', #{wareCode}, '%') and bi.actual_bin_code like concat('%', #{actualBinCode}, '%')
and bi.create_by like concat('%', #{createBy}, '%') and bi.status = 1 and sm.sscc_number not in (SELECT sscc_number from bi_in WHERE delete_flag = 0 and `status` = 1)
and bi.STATUS = 0

select bi.id, bi.material_nb, bi.sscc_number, mm.name as material_name, bi.batch_nb, bi.expire_date, bi.plant_nb, bi.ware_code, bi.recommend_bin_code, bi.actual_bin_code, bi.quantity, bi.pallet_code, bi.pallet_type, bi.status, bi.area_code, bi.create_by, bi.create_time from bi_in bi left join md_material mm on bi.material_nb = mm.code and mm.delete_flag = 0 where bi.sscc_number = #{sscc} and bi.delete_flag = 0 order by bi.create_time desc limit 1

SELECT t.sscc_number, t.material_nb, t.recommend_bin_code, t.create_time, mm.name as material_name FROM ( SELECT si.sscc_number, si.material_nb, NULL AS recommend_bin_code, si.operate_time as create_time FROM si_material_in si left join bi_in bi on si.sscc_number = bi.sscc_number and bi.status = 0 and bi.delete_flag = 0 and bi.ware_code = #{wareCode} WHERE si.delete_flag = 0 and si.ware_code = #{wareCode} and si.sscc_number NOT IN (SELECT sscc_number FROM bi_in WHERE ware_code = #{wareCode} AND `status` = 1)) t, md_material mm where mm.delete_flag = 0 and mm.`code` = t.material_nb order by t.create_time desc
